changes.change: Added Find Motion Tool
Added Colour Picker Tool
Improved scrubbing performance
Added object detector
Improved decoding performance on CUDA GPUs
fixed possible duplication of items in the device tree
Added option to hide objects in the GUI
Improved colours for video view and timeline
Improved setup and management of devices
Added support for ONVIF over HTTPS
Added device tree tooltip which shows the bandwidth
Added monitoring of NVIDIA GPUs
Added support for layouts
Added drag and dropping to re-order items in device tree
Added Chart View for looking at object data in graph form
Improved camera discovery
Fixed a bug where sometimes Find Motion and Find Object windows couldn't be opened
Added digital zoom
Adaptive streaming
Fixed a bug where swapping views would cause a crash
